translations: v．强行闯入；强加；突出；显眼
· He obtrudes his opinions on others.
他把自己的观点强加给别人。

sentences.sentence: A turtle obtrudes its head from its shell.
sentences.translation: 龟将它的头从甲壳中伸出来。

sentences.sentence: Well, you have to speak very carefully or language obtrudes.
sentences.translation: 说话时必须格外小心，否则语言就会干涉。

sentences.sentence: The first and the one I did mention last time is the way in which language obtrudes itself as sound.
sentences.translation: 第一点也就是我上次提到的一点，是语言作为一种声音对自身的干扰。
